displayName.japanese: 生きるのか生かされるのか

description.english: Finished Chapter 14.
description.japanese: チャプター14をクリアした
description.german: Hat Kapitel 14 abgeschlossen.
description.french: Chapitre 14 terminé.
description.italian: Hai completato il Capitolo 14.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 14.

description.english: Guided a survivor to an evacuation shelter for the first time.
description.japanese: 初めて生存者をシェルターに誘導した
description.german: Hat zum ersten Mal einen Überlebenden zum Schutzraum geführt.
description.french: Survivant conduit dans un abri d'évacuation pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai guidato un sopravvissuto fino a un rifugio di evacuazione per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Has guiado a un superviviente hasta un refugio por primera vez.

description.english: Rescued ten survivors.
description.japanese: 10人の生存者を救出した
description.german: Hat 10 Überlebende gerettet.
description.french: Dix survivants sauvés.
description.italian: Hai salvato 10 sopravvissuti.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a diez supervivientes.

description.english: Rescued twenty survivors.
description.japanese: 20人の生存者を救出した
description.german: Hat 20 Überlebende gerettet.
description.french: Vingt survivants sauvés.
description.italian: Hai salvato 20 sopravvissuti.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a veinte supervivientes.

description.english: Rescued all of the survivors.
description.japanese: すべての生存者を救出した
description.german: Hat alle Überlebenden gerettet.
description.french: Tous les survivants sauvés.
description.italian: Hai salvato tutti i sopravvissuti.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a todos los supervivientes.

description.english: Stopped the massacre of civilians.
description.japanese: 市民の虐殺を事前に阻止した
description.german: Hat das Massaker an den Zivilisten aufgehalten.
description.french: Massacre de civils arrêté.
description.italian: Hai arrestato il massacro dei civili.
description.spanish: Has detenido la masacre de civiles.

description.english: Got repeatedly tricked by a suspicious woman at the harbor apartments.
description.japanese: 港の住宅で不審な女に振り回された
description.german: Wurde wiederholt von einer verdächtigen Frau in einem Wohngebäude am Hafen in die Irre geführt.
description.french: Dupé à plusieurs reprises par une femme suspecte aux appartements portuaires.
description.italian: Sei stato ingannato più e più volte da una donna sospetta presso gli appartamenti al porto.
description.spanish: Has sido víctima de las continuas bromas de una sospechosa mujer de los apartamentos del puerto.

displayName.japanese: 大好き　パラダイスバーガー
displayName.french: Le resto de burgers préféré d'Aleksandr

description.english: Received Aleksandr's bill for his meal at Paradise Burger.
description.japanese: アレクサンドルからパラダイスバーガーのツケを渡された
description.german: Hat Aleksandrs Rechnung von Paradise Burger erhalten.
description.french: Facture d'Aleksandr reçue pour son repas au Paradis du burger.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto il conto da pagare per il pasto di Aleksandr da Paradise Burger.
description.spanish: Has recibido la cuenta de la Hamburguesería Paraíso de Aleksandr.

description.english: Placed two groups of men and women who don't get along in the same shelter.
description.japanese: そりの合わない二組の男女を同じシェルターに入れた
description.german: Hat zwei Gruppen von Männern und Frauen, die sich nicht leiden können, im gleichen Schutzraum untergebracht.
description.french: Deux groupes d'hommes et de femmes qui ne s'entendent pas placés dans le même abri.
description.italian: Hai condotto due gruppi di uomini e donne che non vanno d'accordo nello stesso rifugio.
description.spanish: Has colocado a dos grupos de hombres y mujeres que no se llevan bien en el mismo refugio.

description.english: Finished the game for the first time.
description.japanese: 初めてゲームをクリアした
description.german: Hat das Spiel zum ersten Mal abgeschlossen.
description.french: Jeu terminé pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego por primera vez.

description.english: Finished the game on Advanced difficulty.
description.japanese: 難易度ADVANCEDでゲームをクリアした
description.german: Hat das Spiel auf Fortgeschritten abgeschlossen.
description.french: Jeu terminé en difficulté avancée.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco al livello di difficoltà Avanzato.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego en el modo Avanzado.

description.english: Finished the game on Hopeless difficulty.
description.japanese: 難易度HOPELESSでゲームをクリアした
description.german: Hat das Spiel auf Hoffnungslos abgeschlossen.
description.french: Jeu terminé en difficulté désespérée.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco al livello di difficoltà Disperato.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego en el modo Desesperado.

displayName.japanese: 誰かが「生きろ」と言った

description.english: Obtained the best ending for all three protagonists.
description.japanese: 3人の主人公全員が最良のエンディングに到達した
description.german: Hat das beste Ende aller drei Hauptcharaktere erreicht.
description.french: Meilleure fin obtenue pour les trois protagonistes.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto i finali migliori per tutti e tre i protagonisti.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el mejor final para los tres protagonistas.

description.english: Obtained the worst ending for all three protagonists.
description.japanese: 3人の主人公全員が最悪のエンディングに到達した
description.german: Hat das schlechteste Ende aller drei Hauptcharaktere erreicht.
description.french: Pire fin obtenue pour les trois protagonistes.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto i finali peggiori per tutti e tre i protagonisti.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el peor final para los tres protagonistas.

description.english: Crafted a gadget.
description.japanese: クラフトでガジェットを作製した
description.german: Hat ein Gadget hergestellt.
description.french: Gadget fabriqué.
description.italian: Hai creato un gadget.
description.spanish: Has fabricado un accesorio.

displayName.japanese: ヴァンツァーパイロット

description.english: Piloted a normally functioning Wanzer for the first time.
description.japanese: 正常稼働状態のヴァンツァーに初めて搭乗した
description.german: Hat zum ersten Mal einen normal funktionierenden Wanzer gesteuert.
description.french: Wanzer fonctionnant normalement piloté pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai pilotato un Wanzer normalmente funzionante per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Has pilotado un Wanzer en buen estado por primera vez.

description.english: Defeated an enemy Wanzer.
description.japanese: 敵ヴァンツァーを倒した
description.german: Hat einen feindlichen Wanzer besiegt.
description.french: Wanzer ennemi battu.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto un Wanzer nemico.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a un Wanzer enemigo.

description.english: Acquired all three types of backpacks for each protagonist.
description.japanese: 3人の主人公のバックパック各3種をすべて入手した
description.german: Hat für jeden Hauptcharakter alle drei Rucksackarten erhalten.
description.french: Les trois types de sacs à dos acquis pour chaque protagoniste.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti e tre i tipi di zaino per ogni protagonista.
description.spanish: Has conseguido los tres tipos de mochilas para cada protagonista.

description.english: Collected all database information, excluding TUTORIALS and COLLABORATION.
description.german: Hat alle Datenbankinformationen gefunden, TUTORIALS und KOLLABORATION ausgenommen.
description.japanese: データベースの情報をすべて収集した（TUTORIALS/COLLABORATIONは除く）
description.french: Toutes les informations des bases de données récupérées, hors DIDACTICIELS et COLLABORATION.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutte le informazioni del database a esclusione dei TUTORIAL e delle COLLABORAZIONI.
description.spanish: Has recopilado toda la información de la base de datos, sin contar los tutoriales y el contenido de colaboración.

description.english: Used every gadget at least once with any protagonist.
description.japanese: すべてのガジェットを1回以上使用した（使用するキャラは問わない）
description.german: Hat mit einem Hauptcharakter jedes Gadget mindestens einmal eingesetzt.
description.french: Tous les gadgets utilisés au moins une fois avec n'importe quel protagoniste.
description.italian: Hai usato ogni gadget almeno una volta con uno dei protagonisti.
description.spanish: Has usado cada accesorio al menos una vez con cada protagonista.

description.english: Defeated one hundred enemies using offensive gadgets.
description.japanese: 攻撃ガジェットを使用して100体の敵を倒した
description.german: Hat 100 Feinde mit Offensiv-Gadgets besiegt.
description.french: Cent ennemis battus à l'aide de gadgets offensifs.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 100 nemici usando gadget d'attacco.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a cien enemigos con accesorios ofensivos.

description.english: Hit ten enemies with melee attacks from behind.
description.japanese: 10人の敵兵に対して背後からの打撃攻撃をヒットさせた
description.german: Hat 10 Feinde mit Nahkampfangriffen von hinten angegriffen.
description.french: Dix ennemis frappés par derrière en utilisant des attaques rapprochées.
description.italian: Hai colpito 10 nemici da dietro usando attacchi corpo a corpo.
description.spanish: Has golpeado a diez enemigos por la espalda con ataques cuerpo a cuerpo.

description.english: Defeated fifty enemies using either a metal pipe, shovel, sledge hammer, or crowbar.
description.japanese: 金属パイプ・シャベル・工事用ハンマー・バールのいずれかで50体の敵を倒した
description.german: Hat 50 Feinde mit einem Metallrohr, einer Schaufel, einem Vorschlaghammer oder einer Brechstange besiegt.
description.french: Cinquante ennemis battus à l'aide d'un tuyau métallique, une pelle, une masse ou un pied-de-biche.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 50 nemici usando un tubo di metallo, un badile, un martello o un piede di porco.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a cincuenta enemigos con una tubería, una pala, una maza o una palanca.

description.english: Made fifty enemy soldiers bleed to death.
description.japanese: 50人の敵兵を出血によって失血死させた
description.german: Hat 50 feindliche Soldaten verbluten lassen.
description.french: Cinquante soldats ennemis laissés saigner à mort.
description.italian: Hai dissanguato a morte 50 soldati nemici.
description.spanish: Has hecho que cincuenta soldados enemigos se desangraran hasta morir.

description.english: Disabled four enemy drones simultaneously with one EMP grenade or EX EMP grenade.
description.japanese: EMPグレネードまたは強化EMPグレネードで4体のドローンを同時に機能停止させた
description.german: Hat 4 feindliche Drohnen gleichzeitig mit einer EMP-Granate oder EX-EMP-Granate deaktiviert.
description.french: Quatre drones ennemis désactivés simultanément avec une grenade EMP ou une grenade EMP EX.
description.italian: Hai disattivato 4 droni nemici simultaneamente con una sola granata EMP o granata EMP EX.
description.spanish: Has desactivado cuatro drones enemigos a la vez con una granada PEM o una supergranada PEM.

description.english: Set five or more enemy soldiers on fire simultaneously.
description.japanese: 5人以上の敵兵を同時に炎上状態にした
description.german: Hat mindestens 5 feindliche Soldaten gleichzeitig in Brand gesteckt.
description.french: Cinq soldats ennemis ou plus incendiés simultanément.
description.italian: Hai dato fuoco a 5 o più soldati nemici simultaneamente.
description.spanish: Has prendido fuego a cinco o más enemigos a la vez.

description.english: Put out a fire on yourself with an extinguisher.
description.japanese: 炎上状態を消火器の煙で消火した
description.german: Hat sich selbst mit einem Feuerlöscher gelöscht.
description.french: Extincteur utilisé pour arrêter votre combustion.
description.italian: Hai spento le fiamme che ti avvolgevano con un estintore.
description.spanish: Has apagado las llamas de tu cuerpo con un extintor.

displayName.japanese: ヴァンツァーハンター

description.english: Defeated an enemy Wanzer on foot.
description.japanese: 生身で敵ヴァンツァーを倒した
description.german: Hat 1 feindlichen Wanzer zu Fuß besiegt.
description.french: Wanzer ennemi battu à pied.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto un Wanzer nemico mentre eri a piedi.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a un Wanzer enemigo a pie.

displayName.japanese: ヴァンツァーバスター

description.english: Defeated ten enemy Wanzers on foot.
description.japanese: 生身で敵ヴァンツァーを10体倒した
description.german: Hat 10 feindliche Wanzer zu Fuß besiegt.
description.french: Dix Wanzers ennemis battus à pied.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 10 Wanzer nemici mentre eri a piedi.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a diez Wanzers enemigos a pie.

description.english: Completed a close-quarters combo on a staggered enemy mech when piloting a Wanzer.
description.japanese: ヴァンツァー搭乗時によろけた敵ヴァンツァーに対して近接連続攻撃を成功させた
description.german: Hat in einem Wanzer eine Nahkampfkombo bei einem taumelnden feindlichen Wanzer gelandet.
description.french: Combo en combat rapproché réalisé aux commandes d'un Wanzer sur un mecha ennemi chancelant.
description.italian: Pilotando un Wanzer hai completato una combo con armi da corpo a corpo su un mech nemico barcollante.
description.spanish: Has completado un combo de corto alcance contra un mecha enemigo aturdido usando un Wanzer.

description.english: Discarded all weapons on a Wanzer and used only its bare hands to defeat an enemy Wanzer.
description.japanese: 搭乗ヴァンツァーのすべての武装を外した状態でナックル攻撃で敵ヴァンツァーを倒した
description.german: Hat alle Wanzerwaffen abgelegt und nur mit bloßen Händen einen feindlichen Wanzer besiegt.
description.french: Wanzer ennemi battu à mains nues, sans avoir équipé d'armes sur le vôtre.
description.italian: Pilotando un Wanzer, hai gettato tutte le armi e hai sconfitto un Wanzer nemico a mani nude.
description.spanish: Has desechado todas las armas de un Wanzer y lo has usado para derrotar a otro Wanzer enemigo con tus propias manos.

description.english: Defeated twenty enemies in a single Wanzer without disembarking.
description.japanese: 1体のヴァンツァーで降機せずに20体の敵を倒した
description.german: Hat in einem Wanzer 20 Feinde besiegt, ohne auszusteigen.
description.french: Vingt ennemis battus depuis un seul Wanzer sans en descendre.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 20 nemici in un solo Wanzer senza scendere.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a veinte enemigos desde un único Wanzer sin bajarte de él.

description.english: Accumulated the maximum amount of ammunition for five firearm types.
description.japanese: 5種類の射撃武器の弾薬を上限まで所持した
description.german: Hat die maximale Munitionsmenge von 5 Waffenarten gesammelt.
description.french: La quantité maximale de munitions accumulée pour cinq types d'arme à feu.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il limite massimo di munizioni raccolte per 5 tipi di armi.
description.spanish: Has acumulado la máxima cantidad de munición para los cinco tipos de armas de fuego.

displayName.japanese: ストレートフラッシュ

description.english: Possessed at least one handgun, assault rifle, shotgun, submachine gun, and magnum at the same time.
description.japanese: ハンドガン・アサルトライフル・ショットガン・サブマシンガン・マグナムを同時に最低一丁ずつ所持した
description.german: Hatte mindestens eine Pistole, Maschinenpistole, Schrotflinte, Magnum sowie ein Sturmgewehr zur gleichen Zeit im Besitz.
description.french: Au moins un pistolet, fusil d'assaut, fusil à pompe, pistolet-mitrailleur et magnum possédés en même temps.
description.italian: Hai avuto almeno una pistola, un fucile d'assalto, un mitra, un fucile a pompa e una magnum contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Has tenido al menos una pistola, un fusil de asalto, una escopeta, un subfusil y un revólver a la vez.

displayName.japanese: ヴァンツァークラッシャー

description.english: Used either a metal pipe, shovel, sledge hammer, or crowbar to finish off an enemy Wanzer.
description.japanese: 金属パイプ・シャベル・工事用ハンマー・バールのいずれかで敵ヴァンツァーにとどめを刺した
description.german: Hat mit einem Metallrohr, einer Schaufel, einem Vorschlaghammer oder einer Brechstange einen feindlichen Wanzer erledigt.
description.french: Un tuyau métallique, une pelle, une masse ou un pied-de-biche utilisé pour achever un Wanzer ennemi.
description.italian: Hai usato un tubo di metallo, un badile, un martello o un piede di porco per finire un Wanzer nemico.
description.spanish: Has usado una tubería, una pala, una maza o una palanca para rematar un Wanzer enemigo.
